short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over embedded emails and phone numbers on the web to view LiveAgent's pop-up contact cards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over embedded emails and phone numbers on the web to view LiveAgent's pop-up contact cards. If you click on an embedded phone number or email, LiveAgent will automatically create a prefilled ticket/call form.
